# Results reporting {#results-reporting}

The ability to publish results for scientific journals or even group presentation is key.
The current version of beta is implementing the a high quality image output. Any _data step_ allows the researcher to export a high quality visual for reports.

The final release of Tercen is targeted to have a full reporting subsystem in order to convert _workflows_ into reports.
